Name: id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: link
Description: The `link.id` the data belongs to.

Name: internal_identification
Description: The institution's internal identifier for the owner.

Name: collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: company_name
Description:
The full (official) name of the business, as provided by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: trade_name
Description: The trade name of the business.

Name: incorporation_date
Description:
The date that the business was incorporated, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: companies_id
Description:
The institutions responsible for the creation and verification of the owner.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: document_id
Description:
Information regarding the identification document the owner provided to the bank.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: document_id.document_type
Description:
The type of document the owner provided to the institution to open the account. Common document types are:

ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· Brazil
- `CPF` (*Cadastro de Pessoas FÃ­sicas*)
- `CNPJ`(*Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas JurÃ­dicas*)

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: document_id.document_number
Description:
The document's identification number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: additional_documents
Description:
Detailed information regarding additional documents provided to prove the business's ID.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: additional_documents[].type
Description:
The type of ID document. We return one of the following values:

  - `DRIVERS_LICENSE`
  - `PASSPORT`
  - `ID_CARD`
  - `FISCAL_ID`
  - `FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`
Enum: DRIVERS_LICENSE, PASSPORT, ID_CARD, FISCAL_ID, FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD, OTHER, None

Name: additional_documents[].type_additional_info
Description:
Additional information regarding the document type.

> Note: For Business ID documents, this field must return a value from Brazil's open finance network.

Name: additional_documents[].number
Description:
The ID document's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: additional_documents[].check_digit
Description:
The check digit of the ID document.

> **Note**: This field is not applicable for Business ID documents and will return `null`.

Name: additional_documents[].issue_date
Description:
The date the the ID document was issued, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

> **Note**: This field is not applicable for Business ID documents and will return `null`.

Name: additional_documents[].expiration_date
Description: The date the the ID document expires, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: additional_documents[].country_of_issuance
Description:
The three-letter country code that issued the document (in ISO-3166 Alpha 3 format).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: additional_documents[].additional_info
Description:
Additional information about the ID document.

> **Note**: This field is not applicable for Business ID documents and will return `null`.

Name: email
Description: The account owner's registered email address.

Name: emails
Description: Additional list of emails the owner provided.

Name: emails[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main email address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: emails[].email
Description:
The user's email address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: address
Description: The accounts owners registered address.

Name: addresses
Description: Detailed information regarding the owner's addresses.

Name: addresses[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: addresses[].address
Description:
The user's address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: addresses[].additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the user's address.

Name: addresses[].district_name
Description: The distrct of the address.

Name: addresses[].town
Description:
The user's town.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: addresses[].town_code
Description:
The seven-digit code for the town, if applicable.

For Brazil, this is the IBGE town code.

Name: addresses[].state
Description: The state that the address is located in.

Name: addresses[].postcode
Description:
The postcode of the address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: addresses[].country_name
Description:
The name of the country.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: addresses[].country_code
Description: The three-letter country code (ISO-3166 Alpha 3 compliant).

Name: addresses[].latitude
Description: The geographic latitude coordinate.

Name: addresses[].longitude
Description: The geographic longitude coordinate.

Name: phone_number
Description: The account owner's registered phone number.

Name: phone_numbers
Description: Detailed information regarding the owner's `phone_number`s.

Name: phone_numbers[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main phone number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: phone_numbers[].type
Description:
The type of phone number. We return one of the following values:

  - `LANDLINE`
  - `MOBILE`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`

Name: phone_numbers[].additional_info
Description: Additional information about the phone number.
Example: This is their work mobile number.

Name: phone_numbers[].number
Description:
The phone number (not including the country, area, or extension codes).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: phone_numbers[].country_code
Description: The country dialling code. For example: `351` (no `+`).

Name: phone_numbers[].area_code
Description: The area dialling code.

Name: phone_numbers[].extension
Description: The extension code.

Name: parties
Description:
Detailed information regarding the parties allowed to act on the owner's behalf.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: parties[].person_type
Description:
The type of person that is an ownership party of the account. We return one of the following values:

  - `INDIVIDUAL`
  - `COMPANY`

Name: parties[].type
Description:
The access type that the `person_type` has to the account. We return one of the following values:

- `MEMBER` indicates that the `person_type` has read access to the account.
- `ADMINISTRATOR` indicates that the `person_type` can perform all actions for the account (including transfers).

Name: parties[].display_name
Description: The full name of the individual, as provided by the institution. Only applicable if the `person_type` is `INDIVIDUAL`.

Name: parties[].social_name
Description: The social name of the individual, as generally accepted by the country. Only applicable if the `person_type` is `INDIVIDUAL`.

Name: parties[].company_name
Description: The full (official) name of the business. Only applicable if the `person_type` is `COMPANY`.

Name: parties[].trade_name
Description: The trade name of the business. Only applicable if the `person_type` is `COMPANY`.

Name: parties[].start_date
Description: The date that the party was added to the account, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: parties[].percentage_type
Description: The party's equity interest.

Name: parties[].document_type
Description:
The type of ID document the party provided when being added to the account. We return one of the following values:

  - `CPF`
  - `CNPJ`
  - `OTHER_TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`
  - `PASSPORT`

Name: parties[].document_number
Description:
The ID document's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: parties[].document_issue_date
Description: The date the the ID document was issued, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: parties[].document_expiration_date
Description: The date the the ID document expires, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: parties[].document_country
Description: The three-letter country code that issued the document (in ISO-3166 Alpha 3 format).

Name: parties[].document_additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the document.
Example: Confirmed CPF with their driver's licence.

Name: financial_profile
Description: Information regarding the financial profile of the individual.

Name: financial_profile.economic_activities
Description: Details regarding the reported economic activities of the business.

Name: financial_profile.economic_activities[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate whether this is the business's main economic activity.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `economic_activities` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.economic_activities[].code
Description:
The code of the economic activity, as given by the country.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `economic_activities` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue
Description: Information regarding the business's reported revenue.

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue.frequency
Description:
Indicates how often the business declares their revenue. We return one of the following values:
  
  - `DAILY`
  - `WEEKLY`
  - `FORTNIGHTLY`
  - `MONTHLY`
  - `BIMONTHLY`
  - `QUARTERLY`
  - `BIANNUALLY`
  - `ANNUALLY`
  - `OTHERS`
  - `null`
Enum: DAILY, WEEKLY, FORTNIGHTLY, MONTHLY, BIMONTHLY, QUARTERLY, BIANNUALLY, ANNUALLY, OTHERS, None

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue.frequency_additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the frequency.
Example: Recently switched from weekly to monthly.

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue.amount
Description:
The reported revenue of the business.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `informed_revenue` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue.currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `informed_revenue` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.informed_revenue.year
Description:
The year when revenue was last declared.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `informed_revenue` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.patrimony
Description: Information regarding the individual's reported assets.

Name: financial_profile.patrimony.amount
Description:
The reported assets of the business.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `patrimony` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.patrimony.currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `patrimony` field is available.

Name: financial_profile.patrimony.date
Description:
The date that the reported assets applied, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `patrimony` field is available.

Name: financial_relation
Description: Details regarding any additional relationship the business has with the institution (for example, other accounts or products they have with the institution).

Name: financial_relation.start_date
Description:
The ISO-8601 timestamp when the financial relationship between the business and the institution started.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: financial_relation.product_services
Description:
A list of products that the business has with the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: financial_relation.procurators
Description: Information regarding any individuals or companies that can act on behalf of the owner.

Name: financial_relation.procurators[].type
Description:
The type of representative that can access and make changes to the account. We return one of the following values:

  - `LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE`
  - `ATTORNEY`
  - `null`

Name: financial_relation.procurators[].civil_name
Description:
The representatives's full name.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `procurators` field is available.

Name: financial_relation.procurators[].social_name
Description: The person's social name.

Name: financial_relation.procurators[].document_number
Description:
The document number of the representative.

**Note**: For individuals, this is Brazil's CPF number. For businesses, this is Brazil's CNPJ number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `procurators` field is available.

Name: financial_relation.products
Description: Details regarding any additional products that the business has with the institution.

Name: financial_relation.products[].type
Description:
The additional products the business has at the institution. We return one of the following values:

  - `SAVINGS_ACCOUNT`
  - `CHECKING_ACCOUNT`
  - `null`

Name: financial_relation.products[].subtype
Description:
The subtype of the product that the business has at the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: financial_relation.products[].agency
Description: The branch code where the product was opened.

Name: financial_relation.products[].clearing_code
Description:
The banking clearing code for the product.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: financial_relation.products[].number
Description:
The account number of the product.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: financial_relation.products[].check_digit
Description:
The check digit of the product's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.
